doc: Referrer-Policy Warning in "Security & setup warnings" for 2 or more Referrer-policies
1. Add a referer policy to my servers default-ssl.conf
2. Run the security and setup warnings in Nextcloud settings menu
Nextcloud should recognize that I have a global referrer policy set and not throw a warning
The "Referrer-Policy" HTTP header is not set to "no-referrer", "no-referrer-when-downgrade", "strict-origin", "strict-origin-when-cross-origin" or "same-origin".
**Updated from an older Nextcloud/ownCloud or fresh install:**
Login as admin user into your Nextcloud and access
